src:
Norwegian överväger nyemission – vill ta in nya miljarder
Norska flygbolaget Norwegian överväger en riktad nyemission av upp till 27,25 miljoner aktier. Tillsammans med lån planerar att ta in 1,6 miljarder norska kronor. Det skriver bolaget i ett börsmeddelande.
05 Nov 2019, 16:03 by Victor Hultgren

text:
Norwegian is considering new share issue - wants to raise new billions
Norwegian airline Norwegian is considering a private placement of up to 27.25 million shares. Together with loans, it plans to raise 1.6 billion Norwegian kroner. This is what the company writes in a stock exchange announcement.
05 Nov 2019, 16:03 by Victor Hultgren
